question:
Which of the following is / are correct observations?
  1. The members of the council of ministers are individually responsible to the President
  2. The members of councils of Ministers are collectively responsible to the parliament
  3. A vote of no confidence against any minister is taken as a vote of no-confidence against entire council of Ministers
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The members of the council of ministers are individually responsible to the President and vote of no confidence against any minister is taken as a vote of no-confidence against entire council of Ministers.
